alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Floyd; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Floyd, southeastern Walker and Chattooga Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Summerville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Summerville, Trion, Center Post, Subligna, Suttles Mill, Cloudland, Berryton, Tidings, Lake Marvin and James H. Floyd State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
